amendatorysection.para: The State of Nebraska is hereby divided into two water divisions, denominated water division No. 1 and water division No. 2, respectively.

source.para: Laws 1919, c. 190, tit. VII, art. V, div. 1, § 10, p. 833;

annotation.para: For administrative purposes, state is divided into two water divisions. Ainsworth Irr. Dist. v. Bejot, 170 Neb. 257, 102 N.W.2d 416 (1960).
